content: @Sean Do you have any idea how to follow the codebase I mean setting up the initials from https://www.pbr-book.org/?
I completed Introduction part and there is no direct way of how to setup the codebase. I am little bit confused here.
Oops, this book is more like an intermediate level to proceed.

For writing main() there is too much includes in it with so many lines of code. So I have to setup those includes also which is not explained in chapter 1 introduction. :grimacing:
